resources.string: Please Enter the amount that was deducted from this card. You can get the transaction amount either from account statemnt or by calling directly to the representative of your bank.

To Verify Correctness of the account information, system will do a micro transaction of an amount Between 0.5 USD to 1.9 USD. This amount will be debited from this account which will be credited back to your eWallet after the verification.
This Service is Currently not Available for Canadian Users
